subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Christiaan Basson shot an eight-under-par 64 on Thursday to take a three-shot lead at the Alfred Dunhill Championship in Malelane, South Africa, the opening event of the 2015-16 European Tour season.
snippet: Christiaan Basson shot an eight-under-par 64 on Thursday to take a three-shot lead at the Alfred Dunhill Championship in Malelane, South Africa, the opening event of the 2015-16 European Tour season.
